alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 30 at 9:39AM CDT until October 31 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Traverse and Big Stone Counties. In South Dakota, Roberts, Clark, Codington, Grant, Hamlin and Deuel Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 4 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers are possible this afternoon and evening while strong winds are happening. This could considerably reduce visibility at times in localized areas of falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
